channel.title: [Mod Request] Always distant rendering for low-end computers
channel.description:
Hello,
I have a request for what I hope is a simple mod. I noticed that distant objects have lower res textures and simplified geometry. Is it possible to make a mod that would render everything like this regardless of how close the player is?
My laptop used to be a decent gaming laptop, but it's getting kind of old and I get frequent frame rate issues even with all my graphics settings at their minimum. I realize it might look really terrible for everything to be rendered like it's far away, but I think it would really be worth the stable frame rate.
Would anyone like to make this mod for me?
In any case, I'd love to hear your thoughts on the matter. And thanks for your time.
